import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { PostAuthor } from './PostAuthor' import { ReactionButtons } from './ReactionButtons' import { TimeAgo } from './TimeAgo' export const PostsLists = () => { const posts = useSelector(selectAllPosts) const orderedPosts = posts .slice() .sort((a, b) => b.date.localeCompare(a.date)) const renderedPosts = orderedPosts.map((post) => (

{post.title}

{post.content.substring(0, 100)}

View Post
)) return (

Posts

{renderedPosts}
) }
